headline: Pennsylvania American Water Signs Agreement to Purchase the City of Pittston’s Wastewater System
summary: MECHANICSBURG, Pa., June 27, 2025--Pennsylvania American Water announced today that it signed an agreement with the City of Pittston to acquire its wastewater collection system for $26.4 million. The system serves approximately 4,400 customers throughout the city. Pennsylvania American Water is already the drinking water service provider for the City of Pittston and has more than 135,000 customer connections in the region.
